result.eng: The game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ga: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.orig: Stop an cluiche i lár na himeartha
result.html: Stop an cluiche i lár na himearthaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.
result.ponchtml: Stop an cluiċe i lár na himearṫaThe game stopped in the middle of the play.

result.html: Stop an traeinThe train stopped.
result.ponchtml: Stop an traeinThe train stopped.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.orig: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn
result.html: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: Mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
